# DPD PLUS Information & Support

The Planning and Land Use System (PLUS) is a new multi-agency platform for Fairfax County customers to complete their zoning, building, permitting or other land development processes online. Through PLUS, customers can conduct online transactions under the Departments of Health, Land Development Services, Fire and Rescue, Code Compliance and Planning and Development. Customers can create and submit applications online (such as building permits), pay fees, track application status, receive electronic notifications and conduct searches. PLUS replaced all legacy systems (FIDO, PAWS and ProjectDox) beginning October 31, 2022.

To use the new services on the PLUS platform, applicants must first register for a free account at PLUS Application Portal. Others can browse and search the site without logging in. 

## PLUS Application Portal

PLUS can be used to track current applications, make changes to these applications or to start a new application.

Please Note: Microsoft Edge is the preferred browser for PLUS.

Launch PLUS

  


DPD specific applications or processes that have moved to PLUS and are now accepted digitally are listed in the sections below by release (click to expand). You may also click on an application/process name to view the individual webpage for more detailed information.

## 

DPD PLUS Release Information

##  PLUS Release 4 - October 2022 

**Planning Division**

  * Comprehensive Plan Nomination
  * Comprehensive Plan Research



**Zoning Administration Division**

  * Administrative Comprehensive Sign Plan (ACSP)
  * Agritourism
  * Community Garden
  * Family Health Care Structure
  * Food Truck Location Permit
  * Food Truck Operation Permit
  * Limited Riding and Boarding Stable
  * Portable Storage Containers
  * Short Term Lodging Permit
  * Sign Permit
  * Special Permit Extended Hours Request
  * Temporary Dwelling or Manufactured Home
  * Virginia Department of Social Services Form for Home Day Care
  * Zoning Appeal



##  PLUS Release 3 - January 2022 

**Planning Division**

  * Architectural Review Board
  * Architectural Review Board Workshop




**Zoning Administration Division**

  * Construction Site Office and Storage
  * Farmers Market
  * Model Home Sales and Leasing Office
  * Seasonal Sales Commercial
  * Special Event



**Zoning Evaluation Division**

  * Additional Time to Commence Development
  * Interpretations of Approved Zoning Applications
  * Minor Variations of Approved Zoning Applications



##  PLUS Release 2 - July 2021 

**Planning Division**

  * Administrative Review Eligible Project (AREP)
  * Agricultural & Forestal District
  * Intergovernmental Review Requests
  * Public Facility (2232 Review)
  * Public School Expansion or Modification
  * Telecommunications (2232 Review)
  * Wetlands Permit (Tidal Shoreline)



**Zoning Administration Division**

  * Accessory Living Unit
  * Home-Based Business
  * Noise Waivers
  * Vested Rights Determinations
  * Zoning Compliance Letter
  * Zoning Ordinance Interpretations



**Zoning Evaluation Division**

  * Rezoning (zoning map amendment)
  * Special Exception
  * Special Permit
  * Variance



##  PLUS Release 1 - October 2020 

**Planning Division**

  * Comprehensive Plan Amendment



**Zoning Administration Division**

  * Home-Based Business
  * Noise Waiver
  * Zoning Ordinance Interpretations



**Zoning Evaluation Division**

  * Pre-Application Consultation

DPD PLUS User Guides 

The DPD PLUS user guides below provide information on creating and managing a PLUS user account and guidance on performing various DPD related activities using the PLUS system:

Planning Division - PLUS User Guide 

Zoning Administration Division - PLUS User Guide 

Zoning Evaluation Division - PLUS User Guide 

ZED - How to View Staff Comments in PLUS for Special Permits & Variances 

PLUS Overview & Instructional Videos 

Additional instructional videos are available on the **Fairfax County PLUS - YouTube **channel

Frequently Asked Questions 

Please review the PLUS FAQ for Customers to learn more about using PLUS.

Previous:  Next: DPD PLUS User Guides

## PLUS SUPPORT

For more information on the PLUS project and additional resources, please visit the What is PLUS? webpage.

If you have questions or need assistance from DPD staff with submitting an application in PLUS, please contact:

Zoning Permits | 703-222-1082 | DPZMailforZPRB@fairfaxcounty.gov

Zoning Administration | 703-324-1314 | ordadmin@fairfaxcounty.gov

Zoning Evaluation | 703-324-1290 | dpzzed@fairfaxcounty.gov

Planning Division | 703-324-1380 | dpzpd@fairfaxcounty.gov

If you have technical questions (e.g. account setup, password issues) regarding the PLUS system, please contact the Help Desk:

Hours of Operation: Mon. - Fri., 8 a.m. - 4 p.m.  
Email: PLUSSupport@FairfaxCounty.gov  
Phone: 703-324-2222, TTY 711

## PLUS Announcements

To receive periodic updates, announcements, and outage notifications regarding the Planning and Land Use System, subscribe to the PLUS e-mail list.

Subscribe to Email Updates
